page.title: 05Rural Life in Great Raveley
page.content: In this county, life is essentially rural and revolves around farming. Home life and domestic activities in a farm at Great Raveley are described as an example for the whole area. The farmer's household comprises his own wife and children and sometimes his parents. If this is not possible his parents will live in a house nearby, The farmer's household will also include family pets such as dogs, cats, rabbits and even lambs. The family help with some farmwork such as milking cows, rearing poultry, and pheasants. Domestic activities include preparation of food, like baking bread and cakes, jams, pickles, chutney, wine making, growing fruit and vegetables and craftwork, like knitting and sewing. Entertainment in the home mostly revolves around television.
